about_the_game:
amazin' Mage is a top-down, randomly generated dungeon crawler in which players will be tasked with exploring the map to defeat the boss and find their missing master, all in a matter of 3 in-game days. Within this adventure, the players will be able to cast spells, brew potions, and collect items that will make defeating foes and the final boss an easier mission!


CRAFTING
Craft unique potions that give you different effects, making combat against foes easier. Find ingredients dropped by monsters and in chests!


SPELLS
Find different spells that enflame, effect time and trap foes!


RANDOM GENERATION
Each time you play, the game is different! Try different world appearences and explore to your heart's content!


TIME / DAY SYSTEM
Different areas can be accessed depending if it's night and day. Work against the clock to save your master from the bosses!

REPLAY VALUE
There's lots of different modes of play, from Adventure mode to Challenge mode that keeps the game enjoyable each play!

For more information on the Spacefarer Card Game, visit
